page.title: 03THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 2
page.content: bedrooms (47%). I don't really like living on the {estate, }I would much rather prefer, to live in a quiet country {cottage.}Although there are more people on an estate, and more friends to make, I still would like to live in the {countryside.} Personally I like my home very much, and would be sad to leave it, {especially }as I was brought up in it. (H.Thomas) {EMPLOYMENT} We surveyed about {200}people. {120 females,and {80}males about their jobs and wealth. We discovered that {30} males work as manual workers and {35} work as non manual workers , this covers {81.25%}of the males. Which leaves {3}retired and {2}unemployed. Marks Tey is obviously fortunate with Britains'probelm with unemployment. Of the females the clear majority are
